attributes.action: Not to invoke Article 50 process re withdrawal of Uk from EU
attributes.additional_details: Numerous recorded tv interviews with Nigel Farage and Boris Johnson demonstrate the lies that were told.
attributes.background: The referendum result calling for an exit from the EU was achieved through misleading statements, lies and a lack of understanding on the part of many voters. The narrow majority splits the country and there have been no clear plans for withdrawal put forward by Brexit, so process should be stopped.
